metadata.synopsis: This is the Haven state and dialogue for Dammon if he is rescued and brought back to the inn. He can be traded with in certain states and can forge a weapon of hellish power if the player brings him the right material.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Dammon after saving the groveOR (Debug Path)1. Select Act 2 set up in debug book2. Dammon spawns near the stables and is available for talk.

14.speaker: Dammon
14.text: There you are! I'd hoped you'd made it through, but when we didn't hear from you... well. I'm glad you're here now.
14.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

18.speaker: Dammon
18.text: I thought it was you - saving my skin again, I see. Never seen a shapeshifted ox before, but I'm glad you dealt with it before it dealt with us.
18.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

40.speaker: Dammon
40.text: I'm glad to see you're all right. The way here was anything but easy, eh?

32.speaker: Dammon
32.text: Gods above and devils below! That ox was a bloody shapeshifter! Thanks for handling it.
32.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: Earlier, you mentioned you could work 'interesting' materials. What did you mean?

33.speaker: Dammon
33.text: Glad you and Karlach are all right. Well - as all right as any of us.
33.context: NodeContext: Said with a slightly knowing tone

59.speaker: Dammon
59.text: A makeshift Harper's fire might not be where I hoped to set up shop, but maybe I've got something you can use anyway.
59.context: NodeContext: Said with a slightly knowing tone

74.speaker: Dammon
74.text: And if you find any interesting materials in need of working, I'm happy to help.
74.context: NodeContext: Said with a slightly knowing tone

58.speaker: Dammon
58.text: I'll be here if you need anything else.

49.speaker: Dammon
49.text: I'll be here if you need anything else.

12.speaker: Dammon
12.text: I... hesitated to mention this back in the druids' grove - for obvious reasons - but no one has earned my trust if not you.

34.speaker: Dammon
34.text: When Elturel was dragged into Avernus, I was drafted into a devil's smithy. It should have been awful, but infernal metal is like a wild horse. Powerful, exuberant - it'll kill you if you lack technique.

28.speaker: Dammon
28.text: I can sense some, smell it almost, somewhere in the area. Underground, maybe - out there, in the shadows.

45.speaker: Dammon
45.text: If you find it, bring it to me. I'll make something incredible.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Sounds like you had an interesting time in the Hells.
13.context: NodeContext: He secretly did enjoy it but it would be very gauche to say so

67.speaker: Dammon
67.text: Some of us had it easier than others. The baker, the schoolmaster - when Elturel was swallowed up, they could do little but survive.
67.context: NodeContext: He secretly did enjoy it but it would be very gauche to say so

43.speaker: Dammon
43.text: As for me, I won't say I enjoyed my time there, but it was certainly... instructional.
43.context: NodeContext: He secretly did enjoy it but it would be very gauche to say so

51.speaker: Player
51.text: I've got this metal I found in Avernus itself - will that do?
51.context: InternalNodeContext: Player has special hellish metal in inventory

23.speaker: Player
23.text: I found this metal in a place called Grymforge - what do you make of it?
23.context: InternalNodeContext: Player has special hellish metal in inventory

16.speaker: Player
16.text: I think I found a material you could work with. What can you make of it?
16.context: InternalNodeContext: Player has special hellish metal in inventory

15.speaker: Dammon
15.text: Absolutely. Rare to get your hands on this stuff - well done keeping it to hand.
15.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Start of Line]: Player passes object to Dammon. He inspects it (only if we can convey this without showing the object since design needs to be able to iterate it)

[End of Line]: Dammon turns to his forging equipment and does some, uh, general forging. Shouldn't show weapon specifically and can be handled with a generic.
(CINEMATIC DUPE OF N86)

44.speaker: Dammon
44.text: Absolutely. Rare to get your hands on this stuff - well done keeping it to hand.
44.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Start of Line]: Player passes object to Dammon. He inspects it (only if we can convey this without showing the object since design needs to be able to iterate it)

[End of Line]: Dammon turns to his forging equipment and does some, uh, general forging. Shouldn't show weapon specifically and can be handled with a generic.
(CINEMATIC DUPE OF N86)

5.speaker: Dammon
5.text: It's perfect, really. Just a moment - I'll be able to work this one quickly.
5.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Start of Line]: Player passes object to Dammon. He inspects it (only if we can convey this without showing the object since design needs to be able to iterate it)

[End of Line]: Dammon turns to his forging equipment and does some, uh, general forging. Shouldn't show weapon specifically and can be handled with a generic.
(CINEMATIC DUPE OF N86)

10.speaker: Dammon
10.text: There you are. And be careful who you show that to. It might draw the wrong kind of attention.

79.speaker: Dammon
79.text: Well, well, well... I knew I smelled something. And I know just what to do with it. One moment.
79.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Start of Line]: Player passes object to Dammon. He inspects it (only if we can convey this without showing the object since design needs to be able to iterate it)

[End of Line]: Dammon turns to his forging equipment and does some, uh, general forging. Shouldn't show weapon specifically and can be handled with a generic.
(CINEMATIC DUPE OF N115)

38.speaker: Dammon
38.text: Perhaps you've misplaced it? I'll be here should you find it again.

73.speaker: Dammon
73.text: Perhaps you've misplaced it? I'll be here should you find it again.

62.speaker: Dammon
62.text: Perhaps you've misplaced it? I'll be here should you find it again.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: I found some hellish masks, can you make anything of these?

52.speaker: Dammon
52.text: Using something that's already fabricated is tough, but I can try. How many do you have?

3.speaker: Dammon
3.text: Hm. I thought I sniffed a Merregon's scent somewhere. These must've been a pain to get a hold of.

47.speaker: Dammon
47.text: Merregon masks are brittle, so what I make won't last as long as my usual pieces.

39.speaker: Dammon
39.text: There. Be careful who sees you using that, might draw the wrong sort of eyes.

19.speaker: Dammon
19.text: That's not as many as you said you had.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Actually, I'll hang on to them.

53.speaker: Dammon
53.text: Fair enough, they might have use as they are.

76.speaker: Dammon
76.text: If you want me to have another look, you know where to find me.

50.speaker: Dammon
50.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

55.speaker: Dammon
55.text: Nowhere's safe from this damned Absolute.
55.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

31.speaker: Dammon
31.text: Nor from shapeshifting cow-blob-things, though you made short enough work of that one. Glad you handled it before it handled me.

9.speaker: Dammon
9.text: If you need something sharp, I have a few things left.

63.speaker: Dammon
63.text: Isobel said we ought to sit tight for the time being - wait until we hear back from Jaheira. I know she's right, but I can't wait to get moving.
63.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

65.speaker: Dammon
65.text: It's - you! What are the odds? So glad you're all right. Well - as all right as any of us.
65.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

70.speaker: Dammon
70.text: Can't sleep, so I might as well hammer. Need anything?
70.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

27.speaker: Dammon
27.text: I hope that fight with that hideous shapeshifted creature didn't sully your weapon too badly. You'll be needing it.

78.speaker: Dammon
78.text: Did you see it? The path of light? That's good, right? Means we might make it out of here alive.
